verses.text: And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w* \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* a \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \add upon\add* the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

And all the \w acts|strong="H4639"\w* of his \w power|strong="H8633"\w* and of his \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, and the \w declaration|strong="H6575"\w* of the \w greatness|strong="H1420"\w* of \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, whereunto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w advanced|strong="H1431"\w* him, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Media|strong="H4074"\w* and \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*?\f + \fr 10.2 \ft advancedâ€¦: Heb. made him great\f*

For \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* the \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w* \add was\add* \w next|strong="H4932"\w* unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, and \w great|strong="H1419"\w* among the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, and \w accepted|strong="H7521"\w* of the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w seeking|strong="H1875"\w* the \w wealth|strong="H2896"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* to all his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*.
